channel.title: Excel on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Excel on Deuts Log

item.title: Unlocking New Power Query Tricks
item.description: A quick reflection on my Power Query journey and a must-watch video showcasing the latest tricks to enhance workflows.

item.title: Data Analysis with Python for Excel Users
item.description: The post shares the author’s intention to learn Python to reinforce their data analysis skills and invites others to join in starting with a 4-hour free course on YouTube.

item.title: The Underrated TV Shows of 2022 Et Al
item.description: These underrated TV shows from 2022 are worth checking out. The True Story of the LA Lakers dives into the history of the Lakers with rich stories and insightful interviews.

item.title: Notion vs Airtable
item.description: Notion is primarily a note-taking tool with basic database functions, while Airtable is more suited for databases and workflows with a powerful API for integrations, including Excel.

item.title: Excel Stockhistory Function Pro Tips
item.description: Better late than never! The STOCKHISTORY function is a game-changer for tracking your stock portfolio directly in Excel. It’s like having a personal financial assistant that never sleeps!
